alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 3:33AM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...All of southwestern and coastal Mississippi, and all of southeastern Louisiana with the exception of immediate coastal portions of Lafourche, Jefferson, Plaquemines, and St. Bernard Parishes. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
